notifications-description: Send a personalized message when the user gains a level.
next-level-xp: XP needed to gain the next level
card-description: Customize a level card for your server.
plus-background: Want more? Upload own background with StartIT Plus!
xpconfig-description: Manage the leveling difficulty by changing the amount of gained XP.
xpconfig-long-description: Increase the amount of XP gained by sending a message with more than 150 characters or images.
xpconfig-xp-for-attachment: XP multiplier on message with attachment
xpconfig-xp-for-voice: XP per minute spent in a voice channel
xpconfig-muted-payout: Give XP when user is muted
thresholds-description: Set the conversion of the amount of required XP per level.
thresholds-xp-needed-second: XP needed to gain the second level
thresholds-xp-needed-third: XP needed to gain the third level
role-multiplier-desc: Let people with these roles gain more XP than other users.
channel-multiplier-desc: Give more XP points on the specified channels.
exceptions-desc: Specify where and what roles you want to gain XP.
levelingwarning-channel: Note: Currently, leveling won't work on any channel! Add a channel in the box above or click on the "Banned" button.
levelingwarning-role: Note: Currently, leveling won't work for any user! Add a role in the box above or click on the "Banned" button.
message-on-role: Overwrite message when the bot gives user a role
message-on-money: Overwrite message when the bot gives some money
remove-role-tier-reward: Delete previous roles when a user enters a higher tier.
automation-input-clear: Reset user's XP after they leave the server
warning-title: You're about to destroy the world ...almost
warning-desc:
User XP points will be taken completely from the MEE6 bot. Use the button below, only if you have not yet used StartIT leveling on the server {{guild_name}}.
This action is irreversible.
import-info: Bring your levels to us! User XP points will be taken completely from the MEE6 bot.
import-done: Have I told you how much I love you?
import-doing: Just a moment more… We're doing something really awesome!
import-noperm: We have no permission to download data. Please make your leaderboard public.
rounding-warn: After all multipliers are applied, the amount of XP is automatically rounded to whole numbers.
